roles.taxonomist: You create succinct but descriptive labels for nodes in a taxonomy.

tasks.short: Return one category (no punctuation) that is a hypernym of the given categories
tasks.long: Return one category (1-4 words, no punctuation) that is a hypernym of the given categories. Avoid repeating from the list of categories and do not return a category that is more abstract than necessary.

examples:
Sub-categories: college, school, scientific organisation, university
Category: education/research

Sub-categories: arts centre, leisure centre, restaurant, sport stadium, sports club, theatre, tourism business
Category: leisure

Sub-categories: care home, fire station, hospital, police, police college
Category: service

Sub-categories: antiques dealer, art dealer, auction house, film prop business, furniture dealer, liquidator, scrapyard
Category: trader
